messages.message: @Anil do you know if we are looking in to MP apps deployments on customer environments (ST and MT)

@Varun Nandan has been looking into adding Marketplace apps to ST customer environments (see https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05BJCNKZAM/p1749464323312549?thread_ts=1747763420.599959&cid=C05BJCNKZAM)
I finally have a scripts for copying public apps from one env to another (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-4276)
@Varun Nandan not sure how much progress you made with this. I can show you what I have working - you can use your or mine.
@Vinay Thapa Can you help @Anil with the script?

Hi @Anil, this is the script.
One caveat is it won't migrate the app versions if the owner is not present in the target environment.
